TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ActionBlock`1<TInput> extends System.Object implements class System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.IDataflowBlock, class System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1<!TInput>
Public NotInheritable Class ActionBlock(Of TInput) Implements ITargetBlock(Of TInput)
generic <typename TInput> public ref class ActionBlock sealed : System::Threading::Tasks::Dataflow::ITargetBlock<TInput>

summary.span: 提供資料流程區塊，為每個收到的資料項目叫用提供的 委派。

span.span: Provides a dataflow block that invokes a provided delegate for every data element received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE [tpl-install-instructions](~/includes/tpl-install-instructions.md)] ## Examples 下列範例示範使用類別以執行數個使用資料流程區塊的計算，並傳回經過的時間才能執行計算。The following example shows the use of the class to perform several computations using dataflow blocks, and returns the elapsed time required to perform the computations. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分[如何： 在資料流程區塊中指定平行處理原則刻度](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/how-to-specify-the-degree-of-parallelism-in-a-dataflow-block.md)主題。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the [How to: Specify the Degree of Parallelism in a Dataflow Block](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/how-to-specify-the-degree-of-parallelism-in-a-dataflow-block.md) topic. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Complete() cil managed
abstract member Complete : unit -> unit override this.Complete : unit -> unit

summary.span: 向資料流程區塊發出訊號，表示不應接受或產生任何其他訊息，也不應使用任何其他延後的訊息。

span.span: Signals to the dataflow block that it shouldn't accept or produce any more messages and shouldn't consume any more postponed messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之後已在資料流程區塊上呼叫，該區塊將會完成 (使其工作將會進入最終狀態) 已經處理所有先前可用的資料之後。After has been called on a dataflow block, that block will complete (so that its task will enter a final state) after it has processed all previously available data. 這個方法不會封鎖等候完成發生，但將會起始要求。This method will not block waiting for completion to occur, but will initiate the request. 若要等候完成發生，請使用屬性。To wait for completion to occur, use the property. ## Examples 下列範例示範使用方法來通知資料流程區塊，它不應接受或產生任何其他訊息也不使用任何其他延後的訊息。The following example shows the use of the method to signal to the dataflow block that it shouldn't accept or produce any more messages nor consume any more postponed messages . 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分[如何： 在資料流程區塊中指定平行處理原則刻度](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/how-to-specify-the-degree-of-parallelism-in-a-dataflow-block.md)主題。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the [How to: Specify the Degree of Parallelism in a Dataflow Block](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/how-to-specify-the-degree-of-parallelism-in-a-dataflow-block.md) topic. [!code-csharp[TPLDataflow_DegreeOfParallelism#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/tpldataflow_degreeofparallelism/cs/dataflowdegreeofparallelism.cs#2)] [!code-vb[TPLDataflow_DegreeOfParallelism#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/tpldataflow_degreeofparallelism/vb/dataflowdegreeofparallelism.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Completion As Task
public: property System::Threading::Tasks::Task ^ Completion { System::Threading::Tasks::Task ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 物件，表示非同步作業和資料流程區塊的完成。

span.span: Gets a object that represents the asynchronous operation and completion of the dataflow block.
The completed task.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料流程區塊會被視為完成，但當它目前未處理訊息，而且當它有保證，不會處理任何訊息。A dataflow block is considered completed when it is not currently processing a message and when it has guaranteed that it will not process any more messages. 傳回相關聯的區塊完成時，會轉換為已完成的狀態。The returned will transition to a completed state when the associated block has completed. 就會轉換為區塊本身完成處理成功根據資料流程區塊時的狀態定義語意。It will transition to the state when the block completes its processing successfully according to the dataflow block’s defined semantics. 將轉為狀態時的資料流程區塊已完成提前因為未處理的例外狀況處理，而且會轉換到資料流程區塊完成後提前結束之後處理的狀態收到取消要求。It will transition to the state when the dataflow block has completed processing prematurely due to an unhandled exception, and it will transition to the state when the dataflow block has completed processing prematurely after receiving a cancellation request. 如果工作會在完成狀態，其`Exception`屬性會傳回包含造成失敗之區塊的一或多個例外狀況的例外狀況。If the task completes in the state, its `Exception` property returns an exception that contains one or more exceptions that caused the block to fail. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用等待傳播到整個網路的所有訊息的屬性。The following example shows how to use the property to wait for all messages to propagate through the network. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分[如何： 在資料流程區塊中指定平行處理原則刻度](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/how-to-specify-the-degree-of-parallelism-in-a-dataflow-block.md)主題。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the [How to: Specify the Degree of Parallelism in a Dataflow Block](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/how-to-specify-the-degree-of-parallelism-in-a-dataflow-block.md) topic. [!code-csharp[TPLDataflow_DegreeOfParallelism#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/tpldataflow_degreeofparallelism/cs/dataflowdegreeofparallelism.cs#2)] [!code-vb[TPLDataflow_DegreeOfParallelism#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/tpldataflow_degreeofparallelism/vb/dataflowdegreeofparallelism.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property InputCount As Integer
public: property int InputCount { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得等候由這個區塊處理的輸入項目的數目。

span.span: Gets the number of input items waiting to be processed by this block.

value.span: 等候由這個區塊處理的輸入項目的數目。

span.span: The number of input items waiting to be processed by this block.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不包含任何目前正在由區塊所處理的項目或已經由區塊所處理的任何項目。The does not include any items that are currently being processed by the block or any items that have already been processed by the block.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法以張貼至目標資料流程區塊的項目。The following example shows how to use the method to post an item to the target dataflow block. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分[如何： 在資料流程區塊中指定平行處理原則刻度](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/how-to-specify-the-degree-of-parallelism-in-a-dataflow-block.md)主題。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the [How to: Specify the Degree of Parallelism in a Dataflow Block](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/how-to-specify-the-degree-of-parallelism-in-a-dataflow-block.md) topic. [!code-csharp[TPLDataflow_DegreeOfParallelism#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/tpldataflow_degreeofparallelism/cs/dataflowdegreeofparallelism.cs#2)] [!code-vb[TPLDataflow_DegreeOfParallelism#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/tpldataflow_degreeofparallelism/vb/dataflowdegreeofparallelism.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.IDataflowBlock.Fault(class System.Exception exception) cil managed

param.name: exception
param.span: 導致這個錯誤的例外狀況。

span.span: The exception that caused the faulting.

summary.span: 造成資料流程區塊在錯誤 (Faulted) 狀態下完成。

span.span: Causes the dataflow block to complete in a faulted state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之後已經在資料流程區塊上呼叫，該區塊將會完成並將其工作將會進入最終狀態。After has been called on a dataflow block, that block will complete and its task will enter a final state. 錯誤區塊，做為與取消區塊中，會導致遺失緩衝的訊息 （未處理的輸入的訊息，以及 unoffered 的輸出訊息）。Faulting a block, as with canceling a block, causes buffered messages (unprocessed input messages as well as unoffered output messages) to be lost.

span.span: is .

.method hidebysig newslot virtual instance valuetype System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageStatus System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock<TInput>.OfferMessage(valuetype System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.DataflowMessageHeader messageHeader, !TInput messageValue, class System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ISourceBlock`1<!TInput> source, bool consumeToAccept) cil managed

Function OfferMessage (messageHeader As DataflowMessageHeader, messageValue As TInput, source As ISourceBlock(Of TInput), consumeToAccept As Boolean) As DataflowMessageStatus Implements ITargetBlock(Of TInput).OfferMessage

virtual System::Threading::Tasks::Dataflow::DataflowMessageStatus System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock<TInput>.OfferMessage(System::Threading::Tasks::Dataflow::DataflowMessageHeader messageHeader, TInput messageValue, System::Threading::Tasks::Dataflow::ISourceBlock<TInput> ^ source, bool consumeToAccept) = System::Threading::Tasks::Dataflow::ITargetBlock<TInput>::OfferMessage;

This may be .

param.span: 設為 以指示目標在傳回 之前，於呼叫 期間以非同步方式呼叫 ，以便使用訊息；否則設為 。

span.span: to instruct the target to call synchronously during the call to , prior to returning , in order to consume the message; otherwise, .

summary.span: 提供訊息給資料流程區塊，讓它有機會使用或延後訊息。

span.span: Offers a message to the dataflow block, and gives it the opportunity to consume or postpone the message.
The status of the offered message.

returns.span: 如果目標已接受訊息，則會傳回 ，而且來源不應該再使用所提供的訊息，因為現在它是由目標擁有。

span.span: If the message was accepted by the target, is returned, and the source should no longer use the offered message, because it is now owned by the target.

returns.span: 如果訊息已由目標延後，會以通知形式傳回 ，目標稍後可能會嘗試使用或保留訊息，同時來源仍擁有訊息，而且可能會將訊息提供給其他區塊。

span.span: If the message was postponed by the target, is returned as a notification that the target may later attempt to consume or reserve the message; in the meantime, the source still owns the message and may offer it to other blocks.

returns.span: 如果目標會延後訊息，但來源是 ，則會傳回 。

span.span: If the target would have otherwise postponed message, but source was , is returned.

returns.span: 如果目標嘗試接受訊息，但因為來源將訊息傳遞給另一個目標或直接捨棄訊息，使得目標遺漏訊息，則會傳回 。

span.span: If the target tried to accept the message but missed it due to the source delivering the message to another target or simply discarding it, is returned.

returns.span: 如果目標選擇不接受訊息，則會傳回 。

span.span: If the target chose not to accept the message, is returned.

returns.span: 如果目標選擇不接受此訊息，且將不會接受來自此來源的其他訊息，則會傳回 。

span.span: If the target chose not to accept the message and will never accept another message from this source, is returned.
is not valid.
